error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_installation_attempted(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Installer\InstallerKernel::installationAttempted() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ckeditor_bootstrap_tabs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
